translations: 养父母；（新技术）应用者；接受管

sentences.sentence: Early adopter buyers tend to be picky consumers.
sentences.translation: 早期的购买者倾向于是吹毛求疵的消费者。

sentences.sentence: Becoming not only an early adopter but an early discarder, you will realize greater status rewards than you ever imagined.
sentences.translation: 不仅成为早期采用者，而且成为早期丢弃者，您将获得比想象中更大的地位奖励。
早期采用者的交互模型。
